Data.Name: Precast concrete manholes-900mm diameter, up to 3m depth

Fragments.Description: Carbon factor taken directly from the ICE V3: Brick > General. Assumed weight of brick is 2.13kg and 10mm of mortar.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Concrete > Precast RC40/50 with average UK additions. and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers. Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of precast concrete and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on indicative unit mass from supplier for concrete shafts and cover slabs, assumed max. depth for category, and indicative unit mass for iron cover and frame from supplier.

Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of precast concrete and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on indicative unit mass from supplier for concrete house inspection chambers.

Data.Name: Plastic inspection chambers-600mm diameter, up to 1.2m depth

Fragments.Description: Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Plastic > Polypropylene for plastic module and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers and frames. Factor presented is weighted average based on estimated relative masses of plastic pot and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on indicative unit masses for plastic chamber from supplier and ductile iron cover and frame from supplier. Concrete elements for cover and frame support are assumed to be cast in-situ and thus included in bulk materials category; concrete elements here are excluded.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Plastic > Polypropylene for plastic module and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers and frames. Factor presented is weighted average based on estimated relative masses of plastic pot and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on estimated unit masses for plastic chamber based on technical specs from supplier and ductile iron cover and frame from supplier. Concrete elements for cover and frame support are assumed to be cast in-situ and thus included in bulk materials category; concrete elements here are excluded.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Plastic > Polypropylene for plastic module and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers and frames. Factor presented is weighted average based on estimated relative masses of plastic pot and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on estimated unit masses for plastic chamber based on technical specs from supplier and ductile iron cover and frame from supplier. Concrete elements for cover and frame support are assumed to be cast in-situ and thus included in bulk materials category; concrete elements here are excluded.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Plastic > PVC Injection Moulding for plastic pot and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers. Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of plastic pot and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on indicative plastic volume in gully pot DN150 and 300mm depth, PVC density of approximately 1.3t/m3, and indicative unit mass for DN150 grating from supplier.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Plastic > Polyethylene for plastic pot and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers. Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of plastic pot and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on indicative plastic volume in gully pot DN150 and 300mm depth, HDPE density of approximately 0.97t/m3, and indicative unit mass for DN150 grating from supplier.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Plastic > Polypropylene Injection Moulding for plastic pot and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers. Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of plastic pot and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on indicative plastic volume in gully pot DN150 and 300mm depth, PP density of approximately 0.946t/m3, and indicative unit mass for DN150 grating from supplier.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Concrete > 40/50mpa + precast factor for precast concrete and ICE V3: Iron > General for covers. Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of precast concrete and ductile iron cover and frame. Conversion factor based on indicative unit mass from supplier for typical concrete gully pot DN450 and 900mm depth and suitable cover slab, and indicative unit mass for iron cover and frame from supplier.

Data.Name: Channel & slot drains-Precast concrete channel (heavy duty)

Fragments.Description: Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Plastic > Polypropylene Injection Moulding for plastic channel and ICE V3: Iron > General for channel gratings. Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of plastic and ductile iron. Conversion factor based on indicative unit mass from supplier for light duty polypropylene 150mm channel, and indicative unit mass for C250 rated ductile iron grating from supplier.

Carbon factor uses ICE V3: Precast RC40/50 with average UK additions and ICE V3: Iron > General for channel gratings. Factor presented is weighted average based on relative estimated mass of precast concrete and ductile iron. Conversion factor estimated based on technical specs from ACO for heavy duty 200mm channel, and indicative unit mass for D400 rated ductile iron grating from supplier.
Carbon factor taken directly from the ICE V3: Brick > General. Assumed weight of brick is 2.13kg and 10mm of mortar.
Carbon factor taken directly from the ICE V3: Plastic > polyethylene. Weight of petrol interceptor taken to be 0.5 tonnes based on supplier information for a 52l/s bypass interceptor.

Data.Name: Damp proof course and impermeable membrane-Polyethylene membrane

Fragments.Description: Carbon factor taken directly from the ICE V3: Miscellaneous > GRP. Weight of petrol interceptor taken to be 0.5 tonnes based on supplier information for a 52 l/s bypass interceptor.
